summary:
Dragon skull roses and tramp stamp overlays for RaceMenu +
9 Holds + DB Pubic Overlays
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6]UNP Dragon Tattoos and more[/size]
[size=5]Required mod: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url][/size]

[img]https://s25.postimg.cc/74bux758f/image.jpg[/img]
[size=4]Dragon Roses Skull and Tramp Stamp Overlays
[img]https://s25.postimg.cc/spcc72clb/image.jpg[/img]
9 (8) Holds + DB Pubic Overlays[/size]
[size=3]Note: the Morthal Symbol is missing. I wasn't able to get it to work as I wanted. I left a placeholder in the mod in case I decide to give it another try. I added the DB Symbol instead.

Installation:
NMM or manual Esp and Bsa in the Data folder.

How to use the overlays: open console type tfc and move the camera near the spot you want the tattoo. Open console again type showracemenu go to the right in the body paint section. Press T (controller Y) and choose the overlay you want. Press E (controller A) to adjust the color. Press R (controller X) to exit.

Version 2.5

If you want a pubic hairstyle overlay in combination with this check [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49414/?]here[/url]
